properties.description: Various rooms and the availability to access help and support on a one to one basis in a private office.
properties.title: 5 South Market Place, Alford, Lincolnshire

properties.description: A Library with a soft seating area, table and chairs for playing board games and puzzles. Warm free refreshments are available.
properties.title: Alford Library and Focal Point

properties.address: Burgh Baptist Church, Skegness, Lincolnshire PE24 5LT
properties.description: The space is open to all
properties.title: Burgh Baptist Warm Space

properties.address: New Life Centre, Spilsby, Lincolnshire PE23 5DU
properties.description: The space is open to all. A variety of games, crafts, signposting, hot drinks and snacks are available. Spilsby Wellbeing Hub is also a referral & collection point for the warm winter packs too.
properties.title: New Life Centre/Spilsby Wellbeing Hub

properties.description: It is free to join and use the library and everyone is welcome. Alongside free access to books, computers, casual and study seating, the Library runs a host of free activities for adults and children including Connect Over A Cuppa community coffee morning every Friday 10am-12noon, there is no charge for refreshments.
properties.title: Skegness Library

properties.description: The space is open to all. A variety of games, crafts, signposting, hot drinks available. Skegness Wellbeing Hub is also a referral & collection point for the warm winter packs too.
properties.title: Skegness Wellbeing Hub

properties.address: Spilsby Christian Fellowship, Spilsby, Lincolnshire PE235LAA PE23 5LA
properties.description: We are generally open Monday to Friday 9am to 12noon as somewhere you can come and warm up, have a cuppa and meet others. During the week - specific sessions are more suited to different groups of people So Monday and Wednesday - are Toddler Groups - aimed at local families with babies, toddlers and pre-schoolers Tuesday is aimed at parents/carers with newborns to 1yr olds Thursday is "Coffee Morning" a session open to all - but with a predominantly older adult uptake Friday the building is open and can be used as a drop in venue
properties.title: Spilsby Christian Fellowship

properties.description: Somewhere to keep warm or meet people if you feel lonely or isolated. Open every Monday from 10am til 3pm. Come and join us for tea/coffee and biscuits, play some board games, stay for lunch, enjoy afternoon entertainment then afternoon refreshments all for free.
properties.title: Warm Space Place
Strubby, Beesby and Maltby Village Hall
